official_title: A bill to terminate the urban development action grant program.
short_title: Urban Development Action Grant Program Termination Act

summary.text: Urban Development Action Grant Program Termination Act - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to terminate the urban development action grant program. States that such Act shall not affect already approved grants or obligated funds.

titles.title: Urban Development Action Grant Program Termination Act
A bill to terminate the urban development action grant program.
